text: As a freelance developer, I have worked on a variety of web projects. Notable projects include 'La Bancaria,' a web app developed using Next.js, ReactJS, and Tailwind CSS (available at [La Bancaria](https://www.bancarialaplata.com.ar/)); 'Revista Saber Tecnologico,' a website designed for [Revista Saber Tecnologico](https://adut.utn.edu.ar/saber/); 'Argies Company,' 'Gutti SRL,' and 'Pampero Rufino,' where I developed websites to meet various client needs.

Front End developer. My responsibilities included enhancing user experience and interface design, integrating with microservices, consuming REST APIs, collaborating with a senior developer to optimize existing architecture, managing incidents in JIRA, and resolving identified bugs and features.
Design and development of a prototype of a computer platform as a pedagogical resource for deaf and hard of hearing students.
